main event: An observer reported seeing a bright light moving in an erratic flight path for 2.5 minutes on December 10, 1967, in Valley Station, Kentucky.
interesting points: The object was observed moving at high speeds before disappearing behind clouds., The witness initially thought the object was a star or light on an aircraft., The object changed brightness while moving across the sky., There were discrepancies between the observed trajectory and the expected path of a launched weather balloon., Two witnesses were present during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: The primary witness is a 13-year-old male assistant certified public accountant with no prior experience in aircraft recognition.
